# TaskThreadFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate void TaskThreadFunc(IntPtr task, IntPtr source_object, IntPtr task_data, 
    IntPtr cancellable);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| task | Transfer ownership: none |
| source_object | Transfer ownership: none |
| task_data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |
| cancellable | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
